title: Credit Defaulter Probability
description: Improve on the state of the art in credit scoring by predicting the probability that somebody will experience financial distress in the next two years.The goal of this analysis is to build a model that borrowers can use to help make the best financial decisions.
description_lemmatized: improve state art credit scoring predicting probability somebody experience financial distress next two yearsthe goal analysis build model borrower use help make best financial decision
